steps.title: Choose Business Name
steps.description: Select a unique business name and check availability

steps.title: Prepare Documents
steps.description: Gather citizenship ID, business plan, and location clearance

steps.title: Submit Application
steps.description: Submit your business registration application to the Department of Trade

steps.title: Pay Registration Fees
steps.description: Pay the required business registration fees

steps.title: Obtain Business License
steps.description: Collect your business license after approval

offices: Department of Trade, Ministry of Economic Affairs
tips: Check business name availability online first
Ensure your location has proper clearances
